mods.abstract: A dahabiyeh on the Nile River; a large dahabiyeh, once the standard for tourists traveling up and down the river, later replaced by the swifter steamboat ca. 1870's (foreground); smaller boats moored at the docks of a small village surrounded by palm trees (background); "Zangaki 214 Dahabie sur Le Nil Egypte" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
